document.title: Accessing the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool
document.paragraph:
The EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool works with EiffelStudio configuration files. EiffelEnvision provides two means to access the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool installed with EiffelEnvision for use with EiffelStudio projects. requirements2Requirements For all of the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool requirements, please refer to using.xmlUsing the EiffelStudio Conversion Tool. getting_started2Getting Started There are two ways to access and begin to use the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool. (1) When installed, a shortcut to the tool is installed within the EiffelEnvision Start Menu, Programs item under the Tools sub item. (2) Alternatively you can access the tool by simply by using Microsoft's Windows Explorer. Simply locate an EiffelStudio configuration file and right-click to display the configuration file context menu and select Import into EiffelEnvision.
Using either of these options will display the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool. If you selected to start the tool from Microsoft's Windows Explorer, some of the tool settings will be automatically populated for your convenience. see_also2Related SectionsSee also: ..\index.xmlEiffelEnvision for EiffelStudio Developersindex.xmlEiffelStudio Project Conversion Toolusing.xmlUsing the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool
